description:
The world’s most famous
pen-and-paper game for two players is
now in your pocket. If there's no one
around, don’t worry: skilful AI players
will gladly play with you in any of the
4 Tic-Tac-Toe variants available, in 3
different difficulty modes. A single
3x3 playing field too claustrophobic?
Try the new Nine Board game mode
that adds a nice twist and more
strategic depth! Compete in the
League Mode and prove that you're
the Tic-Tac-Toe Champ!
name:
Academy: Tic-Tac-Toe
Noughts and Crosses
